sect2.title: Installation of Gzip
sect2.para: Install Gzip by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: ./configure --prefix=/usr && cp gzexe.in gzexe.in.backup && sed 's%"BINDIR"%/bin%' gzexe.in.backup > gzexe.in && make && make install && cd /usr/bin && mv gzip /bin && rm gunzip zcat && cd /bin && ln -sf gzip gunzip && ln -sf gzip zcat && ln -sf gunzip uncompress
